name: Force Gem
description: A collectible item used for various effects in the game.

fields.name: Gem Type
fields.description: Defines the type and value of the Force Gem.

0.name: Small Green
0.description: A small green Force Gem worth 1.

1.name: Small Blue
1.description: A small blue Force Gem worth 5.

2.name: Small Red
2.description: A small red Force Gem worth 20.

3.name: Small Purple
3.description: A small purple Force Gem worth 50.

8.name: Big Green
8.description: A big green Force Gem worth 1000.

9.name: Big Blue
9.description: A big blue Force Gem worth 1500.

10.name: Big Red
10.description: A big red Force Gem worth 2000.

11.name: Big Purple
11.description: A big purple Force Gem worth 3000.

16.name: Key Invisible (bug)
16.description: A key invisible Force Gem, possibly a bug.

17.name: Big Key Invisible (bug)
17.description: A big key invisible Force Gem, possibly a bug.

18.name: Letter Invisible (bug)
18.description: An invisible letter Force Gem, possibly a bug.

fields.name: Interaction Type
fields.description: Defines how the Force Gem behaves when interacted with.

1.name: Not Interactable
1.description: The Force Gem is not interactable.

3.name: Does not Despawn
3.description: The Force Gem does not despawn.

4.name: Pegasus Boots (West)
4.description: Can be activated with Pegasus Boots in the west direction.

5.name: Pegasus Boots (East)
5.description: Can be activated with Pegasus Boots in the east direction.

6.name: Pegasus Boots (South)
6.description: Can be activated with Pegasus Boots in the south direction.

7.name: Pegasus Boots (North)
7.description: Can be activated with Pegasus Boots in the north direction.

8.name: Pegasus Boots (West)
8.description: Can be triggered again using Pegasus Boots in the west direction.

9.name: Pegasus Boots (East)
9.description: Can be triggered again using Pegasus Boots in the east direction.

10.name: Pegasus Boots (South)
10.description: Can be triggered again using Pegasus Boots in the south direction.

11.name: Pegasus Boots (North)
11.description: Can be triggered again using Pegasus Boots in the north direction.

12.name: Must be activated by variable, then falls from the sky
12.description: Requires a specific variable to trigger the Force Gem falling from the sky.

13.name: Must be activated by variable, then appears
13.description: Requires a specific variable to trigger the Force Gem's appearance.

14.name: Falls from the sky
14.description: The Force Gem falls from the sky when triggered.

15.name: Pegasus Boots (Any Direction)
15.description: Can be triggered by using Pegasus Boots in any direction.

16.name: Falls from the sky, activated by variable
16.description: Must be activated by variable and then falls from the sky.

26.name: Appears, activated by variable
26.description: Must be activated by variable and then appears.

35.name: Under Water
35.description: The Force Gem can be interacted with while underwater.

fields.name: Frames to Appear
fields.description: The number of frames it takes for the Force Gem to appear.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor if Variable 2 indicates this.
